named-native-query.name: MovieAward.getMetricsForInterval
named-native-query.query: SELECT aw.producer AS "producer", aw."year" AS "previousWin", aw_next."year" AS "followingWin", (aw_next."year" - aw."year") AS "interval" FROM MOVIE_AWARD aw INNER JOIN MOVIE_AWARD aw_next ON aw_next.id != AW.id AND aw_next."year" > aw."year" AND aw_next.WINNER IS TRUE AND aw_next.PRODUCER = aw.PRODUCER AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT TRUE FROM MOVIE_AWARD AW_BETWEEN WHERE AW_BETWEEN."year" > aw."year" AND AW_BETWEEN."year" < aw_next."year" AND AW_BETWEEN.WINNER IS TRUE AND AW_BETWEEN.PRODUCER = AW.PRODUCER LIMIT 1 ) WHERE aw.WINNER IS true ORDER BY "interval" DESC;
